title: Boko Haram releases scores of kidnapped schoolgirls
text:
Boko Haram releases scores of kidnapped schoolgirls 6:16pm GMT - 01:38 
Islamist militants drove scores of kidnapped Nigerian schoolgirls back into the town where they had been captured a month ago and abruptly set them free on Wednesday.The captors gave no reason for their release, but Nigeria denied that a ransom had been paid. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
